job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Do you want to make a huge impact on a large e-commerce website? Are you interested in solving groundbreaking research problems while impacting all eBay e-commerce channels? Does working with Artificial Intelligence, cloud computing, large-scale optimization, and large language models excite you? If this sounds like you, the Core AI team at eBay is the right place for you! We are looking for Machine Learning Engineers with a diverse set of backgrounds to join us., We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Machine Learning Engineer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Natural Language Processing (NLP) and experience with Large Language Models (LLMs). You will be responsible for developing and implementing sophisticated deep learning models to further empowering our buyers and sellers. You will work closely with research scientists and multi-functional NLP and platform engineers to create new capabilities from initial algorithms and out to features in our products and services., * Design, develop, and deploy advanced machine learning algorithms, with a focus on NLP/LLM or multimodal interactions.
     * Work closely with cross-functional teams to integrate machine learning solutions into our products and platforms.
     * Conduct research on the latest technologies and methodologies in NLP and multimodal LLMs to drive innovation within the team.
     * Collaborate with data engineers and scientists to preprocess, clean, and structure large datasets for model training and evaluation.
     * Implement best practices in model development, validation, testing, and deployment to ensure high-quality and scalable solutions.
     * Stay abreast of industry trends and advancements in AI, machine learning, and NLP to continuously improve our capabilities.
job_details.full_text:
Machine Learning Engineer

Do you want to make a huge impact on a large e-commerce website? Are you interested in solving groundbreaking research problems while impacting all eBay e-commerce channels? Does working with Artificial Intelligence, cloud computing, large-scale optimization, and large language models excite you? If this sounds like you, the Core AI team at eBay is the right place for you! We are looking for Machine Learning Engineers with a diverse set of backgrounds to join us., We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Machine Learning Engineer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Natural Language Processing (NLP) and experience with Large Language Models (LLMs). You will be responsible for developing and implementing sophisticated deep learning models to further empowering our buyers and sellers. You will work closely with research scientists and multi-functional NLP and platform engineers to create new capabilities from initial algorithms and out to features in our products and services., * Design, develop, and deploy advanced machine learning algorithms, with a focus on NLP/LLM or multimodal interactions.
     * Work closely with cross-functional teams to integrate machine learning solutions into our products and platforms.
     * Conduct research on the latest technologies and methodologies in NLP and multimodal LLMs to drive innovation within the team.
     * Collaborate with data engineers and scientists to preprocess, clean, and structure large datasets for model training and evaluation.
     * Implement best practices in model development, validation, testing, and deployment to ensure high-quality and scalable solutions.
     * Stay abreast of industry trends and advancements in AI, machine learning, and NLP to continuously improve our capabilities.

profile_classification.rationale: The role emphasizes developing and deploying advanced machine learning algorithms, with a specific focus on NLP/LLM and multimodal interactions. While LLMs are mentioned, the core responsibilities align more with traditional ML engineering tasks like algorithm development, data preprocessing, and model deployment, rather than building user-facing applications on top of LLMs.

phrases: Design, develop, and deploy advanced machine learning algorithms, with a focus on NLP/LLM or multimodal interactions
model development, validation, testing, and deployment
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the creation, training, adaptation, and deployment of machine learning models, including deep learning and generative models like LLMs.

phrases: preprocess, clean, and structure large datasets for model training and evaluation
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the essential steps of preparing data for machine learning models, which falls under data engineering.

phrases: integrate machine learning solutions into our products and platforms
features in our products and services
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate the need to embed ML solutions into existing products and services, requiring software development skills for integration.

phrases: deployment to ensure high-quality and scalable solutions
job_tasks.justification: The mention of deploying models and ensuring scalable solutions points to operational aspects of managing ML models in production.

phrases: make a huge impact on a large e-commerce website
job_tasks.justification: These phrases highlight the business context and the goal of impacting e-commerce operations and user experience.

phrases: Conduct research on the latest technologies and methodologies
Stay abreast of industry trends and advancements
soft_skills.justification: The job requires continuous learning and staying updated with the latest advancements in AI, ML, and NLP.

phrases: Work closely with research scientists and multi-functional NLP and platform engineers
soft_skills.justification: The role involves close collaboration with various technical teams and scientists.
The role involves solving complex problems through research and implementing robust, scalable solutions.
The job description implies a need for proactive contribution and driving innovation.
